remarks: Recovery of ~ ax-c15 from ~ ax12v without using ~ ax-c15 .  The hypothesis is even weaker than ~ ax12v , with ` z ` both distinct from ` x ` _and_ not occurring in ` ph ` .  Thus, the hypothesis provides an alternate axiom that can be used in place of ~ ax-c15 .  (Contributed by NM, 2-Feb-2007.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
